name: Higan Tour
description:
A soul wrongly trapped in Higan, seeking to reunite with its body.

Created for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 3.
This is a fan work of the Touhou Project and is not associated with the original creators.

Controls:
Move: W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys
Dash: J or Z
Hide: K or X
Keybinds can also be modified via AppData/Local/Higan Tour/inputconfig.json

Instructions:
See how far up you can go. Unfortunately, we didn't have time to add a score system and an end goal.

Team:
Karob: Coding, design.
Ett orm: Coding, design.
Karamitasu: Music.
pigdevil2010: Graphics.
